name: Butterfly Master
description:
When you enter the game.
Play: Enter Key. (The message should appear: Ready for combat sir! to start playing)

Movement.
Up: Key W.
Down: Key S.
Left: Key A.
Right: Key D.

Shooting and special skills.
Shoot: Left mouse button.
Laser: Right mouse button. (It can be used only when you trap the energy core)
Teleportation: Space Key. (It can be used only when you trap the energy core)
